Articles.Content:
I'm starting a page here where i'll just be leaving all of my aircraft (Might or might not leave download links) since I've started playing again after a 5 month hiatus. It will all, of course, be in 1.3.1, mods will be listed. Boneyard just sounded cool, There will be new and old stuff if I find any. 

Airliners:

Spoiler

No. 1 Airliner Prototype, unnammed.

This is an airliner I was working for the airliner challenge, it never made it due to bad design. It had a bunch of cabins inside of a shell for mimimum noise and minimum passenger comfort. 

This is the interior, totally not unrealistic at all.

Mods Used: Tweakscale, FullAutoStrut because actual wings are usually one or two homogenous peices. 

Other Stats: Not really anything. I forgot about this until I found the screenshots. I just needed filler so the mods wouldn't smite me for taking up space where other, more useful threads could be until I could get some real stuff here.

 

More to come soon, working on a twin- boom attack aircraft at the moment. Twin boom aircraft are just so sexy.

Edited September 15, 2019 by Kernel Kraken
Formatting, Spelling.
